name: ing-agents
description: InG AI Sales Department - Multi-Agent LinkedIn Outreach System

scripts.check: python3 -m py_compile main.py && find src -name '*.py' -exec python3 -m py_compile {} \; && echo '✅ Syntax check passed'
scripts.lint: flake8 src/ main.py --max-line-length=120 --ignore=E501,W503 || echo '⚠ Install flake8: pip install flake8'
scripts.format: black src/ main.py || echo '⚠ Install black: pip install black'
scripts.test: pytest tests/ -v || echo '⚠ Install pytest: pip install pytest'
scripts.clean: find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -r {} + 2>/dev/null; find . -name '*.pyc' -delete 2>/dev/null; echo '✅ Cleaned'

author: InG
